availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
12
The Governor approved an account of $5.00 to Meek & Miland for work done on clock for Registers & Governors Office, duly certified as correct
He approved an account of $43.10 to E H. Tole for work and repairs done at State Capitol Certified as correct by the State Librarian
He approved an account of $1365. to the Institution for the Blind for the board and tuition of the Pupils for the quarter ending Jany 1st 1861. Certified by the Auditor as correct.
He approved an account of $75. to Richd Glore for 25 cords of Wood @ $3 per cord certified as correct by the Librarian
